actionId.description: The action ID, as defined in the tool's resource definition.

inputHandles.description: Handles to the input data to use for this execution.

outputHandles.description:
On the request, this specifies locations to the SharedStorage also represented as Datasets
and or others datasets to write output to.
Any data which the tool writes to the directory specified by SC_TOOL_OUTPUT_DIR is written
to the default SharedStorage location, and any additional
locations specified in this array.

nodePoolIds.description: IDs of NodePools to use for this execution.

sharedStorage.description: The shared storage which would be mounted on the nodepools and made available for the tool to use for this execution.

runtimeState.description: The runtime state of the execution.

runtimeDetails.description: Human-readable details about the execution status.

createdTime.description: The time the execution was created.

errorDetails.description: Error details if the execution failed.

toolReport.description: Details provided by the tool (rather than the platform).
